column5: http://cache.valleywag.com/assets/resources/screenclean.swf  Since I found this link, the screen has never been cleaner.
My screen isn`t cold enough! The dogs keep the sliding glass door clean to the outside world. They like ice cubes too! Canadian dogs?
But won't it smell like dogbutt?  JF
cool, i need that as a screensaver, can clean while i'm away
